content: {"locationId": "4248", "organizationId": "3615", "name": "Needs Inc.", "address1": "900 Central Ave", "address2": "", "city": "Cheyenne", "state": "WY", "zipCode": "82007-137", "country": null, "phone": "", "phoneExt": "", "website": "http://www.needsinc.org/", "latitude": "41.1270472", "longitude": "-104.8104652", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "", "aboutUs": "Needs Inc's mission is:   Providing food, essentials, and resources to Laramie County residents during our times of adversity.    As the largest food pantry in Laramie County, they provide food to residents in need. Available services include our 10 commodity box to anyone with a valid photo ID and our 30 day monthly food box to those who qualify.   Other resources that are provided are:   Clothing  - available to individuals and families in Laramie County at no cost;  School Supplies  - provides hundreds of children with the required supplies via our Back 2 School Bash event in August in partnership with United Way\u2019s Education Collaborative;  Referrals -  provides timely and accurate referrals to other health and human service agencies;  Hygiene Kits  - provides the essential needs to those who are facing adversity and this includes hygiene items. These kits are available to anyone in need every 6 months; and lastly, our  Low Cost Thrift Store  - exists to provide essential needs and goods at affordable prices to the community, while helping fund our mission at Needs Inc.", "notes": "We are closed Friday-Sunday, & All Federal Holidays", "contactName": "", "contactPhone": "307-632-4132", "contactEmail": "", "servicePrograms": "", "foodServiceTypes": "Accepts Walk-Ins, Indoor Service, Pre-Packed Boxes / Bags, TEFAP Program", "dietRestrictions": "", "foodOfferings": "Dairy, Fruits & Vegetables, Meat, Shelf Stable/Non-Perishable Goods, Toiletries / Hygiene Products", "networkAffiliations": [{"regionId": 39, "regionName": "Food Bank of Wyoming", "logoBlobNameSmall": "6512cb05-5d35-4e08-a231-898a62db5bc7.png", "website": "https://wyomingfoodbank.org/"}], "timeZoneName": "Mountain Standard Time", "timeZoneCode": "MT", "offsetHours": "-6", "schedules": ["Monday 8:30 AM-6:00 PM", "Monday 8:30 AM-6:00 PM", "Tuesday 8:30 AM-6:00 PM", "Tuesday 8:30 AM-6:00 PM", "Wednesday 8:30 AM-4:00 PM", "Wednesday 8:30 AM-4:00 PM", "Thursday 8:30 AM-4:00 PM", "Thursday 8:30 AM-4:00 PM"], "services": [], "specialHours": [{"locationSpecialHoursId": 8366, "locationId": 4248, "specialDate": "2025-09-01T00:00:00", "startTime": null, "endTime": null, "startTimeDescr": null, "endTimeDescr": null, "closedInd": true, "notes": "", "addDateTime": "2025-03-14T15:43:57.913", "addUserName": "WStevens@foodbankrockies.org", "updateDateTime": null, "updateUserName": null}]}
